Description: The Occupational Safety and Health Administration and Ashley Furniture, the nation's largest retailer of home furnishings, entered into a corporate-wide settlement agreement resolving all pending OSHA citations at the company's plants in Arcadia and Whitehall Wisconsin, and in Ecru and Ripley, Mississippi.
Agency: Occupational Safety & Health Administration corporate-wide settlements

NAICS Translation: 337215: Showcase, Partition, Shelving, and Locker Manufacturing
